channel.title: Outside Options on Flavio Hafner
channel.description: Recent content in Outside Options on Flavio Hafner

item.title: The Equilibrium Effects of Workersâ€™ Outside Employment Options: Evidence from a Labor Market Integration
item.description: We study a reform that eased cross-border commuting from France to the high-wage Swiss labor market. The results indicate that the reform increased the value of local job search, drawing more workers into the labor force and lowering labor market tightness.
